name: Sendblue
headline: iMessage for Sales
description: Sendblue provides businesses with virtual iMessage lines to text prospects and nurture leads. Our users on average see a 60% increase in response rate. The company is founded by Rob Haber, former ML Engineer at Scale AI, and Alex Luis, former PM at PwC's telecom practice.

founders.name: Rob Haber, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CEO of Sendblue. Former ML Engineer at Scale AI, and before that worked at Amazon, Regeneron and his own beef jerky company.

founders.name: Alex Luis, Founder
founders.description: Alex, a former sumo wrestler born in Tokyo, was a PM and consultant at PwC's telecom practice. There, he worked with emerging technologies like 5G, NFTs, and IoT. He's now a Co-founder @ sendblue and lives in NYC.

## Why is better than
### Avoid opt-out language
Stop looking like a bot ü§ñ while remaining compliant.*
![Illustration4](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66edf6078b47584cfeee4b62/66edf6078b47584cfeee4bd1_Illustration4.avif)![opy visual mobile](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66edf6078b47584cfeee4b62/66edf6078b47584cfeee4bd4_opy%20visual%20mobile.avif)
### Group chats
Team up with contacts and other team members.
![illustration2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66edf6078b47584cfeee4b62/66edf6078b47584cfeee4bd0_illustration2.avif)
### No A2P Registration Required
Save 2-3 weeks on a lengthy A2P registration process and start messaging immediately.
![Illustration1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66edf6078b47584cfeee4b62/66edf6078b47584cfeee4bcf_Illustration1.avif)
### Voice memos, Videos and Photos
Don't send ü•î quality photos via SMS and instead send videos, voice memos, and high res photos.
![Illustration3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66edf6078b47584cfeee4b62/66edf6078b47584cfeee4bd3_Illustration3.avif)![chat mobile](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66edf6078b47584cfeee4b62/66edf6078b47584cfeee4bd5_chat%20mobile.avif)
### Unlimited Messaging
Flat monthly pricing based on phone lines. No hidden carrier fees or additional message segment costs.
![Illustration5](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66edf6078b47584cfeee4b62/66edf6078b47584cfeee4bd2_Illustration5.avif)
* Consult with your legal counsel to ensure that your opt-out process is compliant with applicable law and consistent with industry standards.
## Start sending blue, watch the green come in 
[Get started](https://www.sendblue.com/</request-a-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66edf6078b47584cfeee4b62/66edf6078b47584cfeee4bda_net.png)
## Integrate with the platforms you use today
![highlevel](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66edf6078b47584cfeee4b62/66edf6078b47584cfeee4b91_highlevel_icon.jpeg.svg)
![slack](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66edf6078b47584cfeee4b62/66edf6078b47584cfeee4b95_slack.svg)
![close symbol](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66edf6078b47584cfeee4b62/66edf6078b47584cfeee4b90_close_symbol.svg.svg)
![calendly](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66edf6078b47584cfeee4b62/66edf6078b47584cfeee4b92_calendly_symbol.svg.svg)
![salesforce](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66edf6078b47584cfeee4b62/66edf6078b47584cfeee4b8c_salesforce_logo.svg.svg)
![slides](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66edf6078b47584cfeee4b62/66edf6078b47584cfeee4b8d_image%201.svg)
##  We've sent 10,000,000+ iMessages 
## FAQ
What if the person I'm messaging doesn't have iMessage?
We will fall back and fulfill the message with SMS from the same phone number at no additional charge.
Can I call from these numbers?
Yes! You can call your contacts from the same iMessage phone number that you're texting them from.
Can I do message blasts?
No. We do not support message blasts as they are commonly used for spam and damage the reputation of iMessage.
Do you support voice memos?
Yes we support voice memos and any other file type you can send via iPhone (mp3, mp4, etc.)
Can I port over my own phone number?
Yes. We can port over any number and enable it with iMessage. Please note it requires an additional 3-5 days for set up.
Is it really unlimited texting?
We allow our users to send unlimited texts to their contacts. However, we do have a limits on contacts messaged per day per **phone line** to prevent spam. Additional phone lines can be purchased to raise the limit.
## Don't leave us on read 
Drive sales with the most engaging messaging channel.
[Request a demo](https://www.sendblue.com/<#>)
## Get startedtoday

generated_description:
Sendblue is a fresh startup that emerged from Y Combinator's Batch S23 in 2023, founded by Rob Haber, a former Machine Learning Engineer at Scale AI, and Alex Luis, who previously managed projects at PwC's telecom division. Based in New York, Sendblue is on a mission to redefine sales communication by offering businesses virtual iMessage lines tailored for texting prospects and nurturing leads. 

The essence of Sendblue is simple yet powerful: transforming sales interactions through the most engaging messaging platform available today‚ÄîiMessage. On average, users experience a remarkable 60% boost in response rates, a clear indicator that texting, particularly through a platform like iMessage, resonates more with clients than traditional methods.

Currently, the team comprises around 10 employees, and they are supported by Dalton Caldwell as their Group Partner. The company prides itself on features that enhance communication while avoiding pitfalls common in mass messaging, such as spammy practices or cumbersome regulations.

Here's what Sendblue offers:

1. **Instant Messaging**: Businesses can instantly reach out to leads and customers without lengthy registration processes.
2. **Multimedia Support**: Send videos, voice memos, and high-quality images, not just text.
3. **Unlimited Messaging**: After setting up a virtual line, businesses can send unlimited texts, although they enforce daily limitations on contacts to prevent spam.
4. **Integration Ready**: Easily integrates with popular platforms like Slack, Salesforce, and Calendly, making it versatile for existing workflows.

To sum it up, Sendblue isn‚Äôt just another messaging service; it‚Äôs a native sales platform designed for the modern salesperson looking to leverage the power of personal and direct communication. For any business wanting to elevate their outreach and customer interaction, Sendblue could be a game changer. If you‚Äôre intrigued, you can explore more on their [website](https://www.sendblue.com) or request a demo to see it in action.
